A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"I think the hero's journey of Luke Skywalker concluded in 'Return of the Jedi.' This [trilogy] is the hero's journey of Rey\, and Finn\, and Poe\,\" Johnson said. \"The [ongoing] story of Luke is one that has to play in tandem with that of Rey.\" Rian Johnson.\n\nHad Rian said this one week before the movie came out it wouldn't have made enough to break even.
